author: Staff Reporter
text:
One-way traffic has been introduced on Junction Main Road from AVR Roundtana to Five Road Junction after work began for the construction of two-tier flyovers.

A Hyderabad-based company has been entrusted with the task of completing the flyover in 39 months.

The first level flyover will start from AVR Roundtana and pass through Five Road Junction and split into two, while one will lead to New Bus Stand and the other would lead to Ramakrishna Junction. The second level flyover will start from Kuranguchavadi and pass through Five Road Junction and end near New Bus Stand.

This flyover will have two legs with one leg for New Bus Stand and the other legs ending near Anna Park.

On Wednesday, barricades were erected in the stretch from AVR Roundtana to Five Road Junction and dredging work began. Also, traffic personnel removed the speed-breaker installed near the AVR Roundtana.
title: One-way traffic introduced
